name: Mesopelagic Crustaceans of the North Western Portuguese Coast between 1998 and 2000
description: The objective of this data collection was to studythestructure of the mesopelagic ecosistem off the Northwestern Portuguese coast which is composed by planktonic and nectonics organisms. Mesopelagic organisms live during thedayconcentrating in big numbersin deeper depths while duringthe night migrates towards the upperlayers. The data was collected aiming to study the compositionand the Dynamics of themesopelagic community and their trophic relationswith the fish in thearea. Data was collected with an Isaac-Kidd midwater trawl in May 1998 and 2000 and February1999, together with environmental parametersas temperature, salinity,etc.
